page.title: 16GREAT SARRATT HALL.
page.content: Great Sarratt Hall was built in the 15th.Century and stands in 250 acres. Originally a farm house,the hall is now a private residence. The Hall has undergone a great many changes,with the front and sides of the house being altered at different times to suit varying styles or fashions. A tennis court and swimming pool have also been added to its amenities. Local people are retained to maintain the property and its large gardens. Great Sarratt Hall is supposed to have the ghost of a man. You can tell when you are in its presence by the sweet smell of perfume. LITTLE SARRATT HALL. Built in 1810, although its barns are much older, Little Sarratt Hall used to be a farm. Now,it too,is a private residence.Its outhouses also converted into housing.
